SEARCH
Module com.flashcardapp
Package com.flashcardapp

Class FlashcardApp

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.flashcardapp.FlashcardApp
public class FlashcardApp extends javafx.application.Application
Main application class for the Flashcard study helper. Manages the application lifecycle, scene transitions, and global state.
